activation.en: At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.

effect.en: When you Special Summon "Uria, Lord of Searing Flames", "Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder", or "Raviel, Lord of Phantasms" using the method mentioned on that card, you can use face-up Fiend monsters, Continuous Spells, and/or Continuous Traps you control, regardless of the card type the text requires.
